sentences.sContent: Paul is then left to choose one box to open to retrieve the mussel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Paul is then left to choose one box to open to retrieve the mussel.
sentences.sCn: 然后让保罗选择打开其中一个箱子来获得贻贝。

sentences.sContent: Pisaster has everted its stomach out through its mouth, and it'sdigesting the mussel externally.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pisaster has everted its stomach out through its mouth, and it'sdigesting the mussel externally.
sentences.sCn: 海星通过嘴部把胃翻了出来，它正从外部消化这只贻贝。

sentences.sContent: In the shallows, the dark, water-soakedsticks and twigs, smooth and old, were undulating in clusters on the bottomagainst the clean ribbed sand, and the track of the mussel was plain.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the shallows, the dark, water-soakedsticks and twigs, smooth and old, were undulating in clusters on the bottomagainst the clean ribbed sand, and the track of the mussel was plain.
sentences.sCn: 滩头水浅处，湖底沙地干净整洁，纹路层叠，贻贝爬过的痕迹清晰可辨，另有长短不一的枝桠成簇在水底摇摆不定，或光滑或腐朽，一律给湖水浸得发乌。

synos.tran: 蚌；[无脊椎]贻贝；[水产]淡菜

trans.tranOther: a small sea animal with a soft body that can be eaten and a black shell that is divided into two parts
